item.name: MongoDB asserts msg
item.description: Number of message assertions raised during the selected time period

item.name: MongoDB asserts regular
item.description: Number of regular assertions raised during the selected time period

item.name: MongoDB asserts user
item.description: Number of assertions corresponding to errors generated by users during the selected time period

item.name: MongoDB asserts warning
item.description: Number of warning assertions raised during the selected time period

item.name: MongoDB WiredTiger cache.bytes currently in the cache
item.description: Amount of space taken by cached data (bytes)

item.name: MongoDB WiredTiger cache.modified pages evicted
item.description:
Number of pages evicted from the cache
wiredTiger.cache.unmodified pages evicted + wiredTiger.cache.modified pages evicted
Resource: Saturation

item.name: MongoDB WiredTiger cache.tracked dirty bytes in the cache
item.description:
Amount of space taken by dirty data in the cache (bytes)
Dirty data designates data in the cache that has been modified but not yet applied (flushed) to disk. Growing amounts of dirty data could represent a bottleneck where data isn’t being written to disk fast enough. Scaling out by adding more shard will help you reduce the amount of dirty data. Note that the amount of dirty data is expected to grow until the next checkpoint.

item.name: MongoDB WiredTiger cache.unmodified pages evicted
item.description:
Number of pages evicted from the cache
wiredTiger.cache.unmodified pages evicted + wiredTiger.cache.modified pages evicted
Resource: Saturation

item.name: MongoDB WiredTiger Concurrent Transactions read available
item.description: Number of available read tickets remaining

item.name: MongoDB WiredTiger Concurrent Transactions read out
item.description: Number of read tickets in use

item.name: MongoDB WiredTiger Concurrent Transactions write available
item.description: Number of available write tickets remaining

item.name: MongoDB WiredTiger Concurrent Transactions write out
item.description: Number of write tickets in use
